data.title: Mertz Cracks Davey O’Brien Award Watch List
data.meta_description: The senior quarterback has been recognized as one of the elite passers in the country.
data.text:
The senior quarterback has been recognized as one of the elite passers in the country.

Share

GAINESVILLE, Fla. – Florida quarterback Graham Mertz has been named to the 2024 Davey O'Brien National Quarterback Award Preseason Watch List. The recognition comes following a season which saw Mertz become one of the most efficient passers in the country, finishing third in the nation in completion percentage (min. 250 completions).

A transfer from Wisconsin, Mertz became a team leader and one of UF's top players in 2023, throwing for a career-high 2,903 yards. Mertz led the Southeastern Conference by completing 72.9 percent of his passes (261 of 358) with a career-high 20 touchdowns and just three interceptions.

Mertz is one of six quarterbacks from the Southeastern Conference named to this year's watch list.

Florida is home to three Davey O'Brien Award wins, with Danny Wuerffel taking home the award in back-to-back seasons in 1995 and 1996 and Tim Tebow claiming the Trophy in 2007

The Davey O'Brien National Quarterback Award is presented annually to the nation's best college quarterback and is the oldest and most prestigious national quarterback award. The 48th Annual Davey O'Brien Awards Dinner honoring the winner will be held Monday, Feb. 17, 2025, at The Fort Worth Club in Fort Worth, Texas.

A Davey O'Brien Midseason Watch List will be released on Tuesday, Oct. 22. The Midseason Watch List will be cut down to the 35-player Davey O'Brien QB Class of 2024 on Tuesday, Oct. 29. Fan voting on social media (Facebook, Instagram and Twitter) will earn players bonus selection committee votes during the semifinalist, finalist and winner voting rounds. First-round fan voting will begin Oct. 29 following the QB Class announcement.

The list of semifinalists selected from the QB Class will be named on Tuesday, Nov. 12. The Foundation will announce the three finalists two weeks later (Tuesday, Nov. 26). The 2024 Davey O'Brien Award winner will be unveiled live on ESPN on Thursday, Dec. 12, during The Home Depot College Football Awards.

A complete list of the 2024 Davey O'Brien Award Watch List nominees can be found here.

2024 FLORIDA FOOTBALL TICKETS

Fans can now reserve their seats in The Swamp for the 2024 season, featuring seven home games with matchups against Miami, UCF, LSU, Ole Miss and more. Season ticket packages are available starting at only $480 per ticket, plus a required Booster contribution based on seating area. Season ticket holders enjoy great perks such as an annual gift, priority access to Florida-Georgia game tickets, away games tickets, postseason tickets, and more.

Click here to buy season tickets, call the Gator Ticket Office at (352) 375-4683, or fill out this form to be contacted by a ticket office representative. Single-game tickets are also on sale now by clicking here.
